articles.content: Elliot Page has spoken out about the 'intense' depression and anxiety he battled before coming out as transgender, admitting that he constantly wanted to 'flee' from his body and would have 'severe p… [+7871 chars]

articles.title: Zendaya cuddles up to boyfriend Tom Holland as she posts a touching happy birthday message - Daily Mail
articles.description: Zendaya gushed over her boyfriend Tom Holland in a special birthday message for the Spider-Man star on Wednesday.
